headline: Is Cigna Group (CI) Offering Opportunity After Mixed Returns And Low P/E Multiple
summary: If you are wondering whether Cigna Group’s current share price reflects its true worth, you are not alone and this article is built to help you frame that question clearly. Cigna Group recently closed at US$277.94, with returns of 2.1% decline over 7 days, 0.7% over 30 days, 0.4% decline year to date, 1.0% over 1 year, 5.5% decline over 3 years, and 34.3% over 5 years. Taken together, these figures give a mixed picture of how the market has been reassessing the stock over different time...
